sentences.en: Adjust the opacity as you see fit . Click save.
sentences.cn: 调整透明度直到你觉得合适为止.

sentences.en: By definition a cataract is an opacity in the lens.
sentences.cn: 白内障的定义就是晶状体混浊.

sentences.en: Covering power: The opacity achieved by a printing ink.
sentences.cn: 遮盖力: 油墨所达到的不透明程度.

sentences.en: He insisted that the mineral content of the water determined the opacity.
sentences.cn: 他坚持认为水的清澈程度取决于其中矿物质的含量。

sentences.en: I set it to multiply at about 10 - 20 % opacity.
sentences.cn: 我设置它为百分之十或二十的透明度.

sentences.en: Opacity is due to crazes in the resin.
sentences.cn: 不透明是因树脂中产生裂纹.

sentences.en: Opacity is the reciprocal of transmission.
sentences.cn: 阻光率是透射率的倒数.

sentences.en: Opacity of the eye lens can be induced by deficiency of certain vitamins.
sentences.cn: 眼球晶状体的混浊可由缺乏某些维生素造成。

sentences.en: Opacity of the lens is readily visible, especially in advanced cases.
sentences.cn: 晶状体的混浊易于识别, 特别是在晚期病例.

sentences.en: Opacity: Degree of obstruction to transmission or reflection of light.
sentences.cn: 不透明度: 阻碍光线透过的程度.

sentences.en: Than set the shape to Opacity 7 % and Overlay.
sentences.cn: 超过规定的形状,以不透明7%和覆盖.

sentences.en: The opacity is a function of temperature and wavelength.
sentences.cn: 暗度是温度与波长的函数.

sentences.en: This results in zero opacity for all sample points inside the cell.
sentences.cn: 这使得单元内部的所有样本点的都是透明的.

sentences.en: To decrease the usage of white pigment because of possessing good opacity.
sentences.cn: 白色不透明可减少白色颜料使用量.

sentences.en: When it came to drawing joint conclusions, there was a nearly impenetrable opacity about Heath's formulations.
sentences.cn: 临到要做结论时, 希思的话变得晦涩难懂起来.

trans.tran_cn: 不透明性，费解，难懂，模糊
trans.tran_en: the quality that something has when it is difficult to see through
